TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension
Public NotInheritable Class HttpBinding Inherits ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: XML Web services 내에서 에 추가되는 확장성 요소를 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents an extensibility element added to a within an XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 클래스의 확장성 요소로 사용 하 여 HTTP로 전달할 정보 지정 합니다.The use of this class as an extensibility element specifies that information is to be passed by HTTP. XML 웹 서비스에 대 한 프로토콜의 사양에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)합니다.For more information about specification of protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 자세한 내용은 대 한 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 ()에서 사양을 참조 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/합니다.For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는의 일반적인 사용의 `HttpBinding` 클래스입니다.The following example shows a typical usage of the `HttpBinding` class. [!code-cpp[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_HttpBinding/CPP/httpbinding.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_HttpBinding/CS/httpbinding.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_HttpBinding/VB/httpbinding.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: SOAP에 사용할 HTTP 전송을 나타내는 XML 네임스페이스에 대한 URI를 지정합니다.

span.span: Specifies the URI for the XML namespace representing the HTTP transport for use with SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 필드 값이 "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/"입니다.The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/". ## Examples 다음 예제에서는의 일반적인 용도 `Namespace` 필드입니다.The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Namespace` field. [!code-cpp[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpBinding_HttpBinding/CPP/httpbinding_ctor.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpBinding_HttpBinding/CS/httpbinding_ctor.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpBinding_HttpBinding/VB/httpbinding_ctor.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Verb { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: HTTP 요청을 만든 메서드가 "GET" 메서드인지 또는 "POST" 메서드인지 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the HTTP request will be made using the "GET" or "POST" method.
A string containing one of two possible values, "GET" or "POST".
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 다음 예제에서는 새 `HttpBinding` 설정 하 고 해당 `Verb` 속성입니다.The following example creates a new `HttpBinding` and sets its `Verb` property. WebServices_HttpBinding#2WebServices_HttpBinding#2
